name: Little Cleaner
description:
Use your powerful machine to feed the [Collector].

"Little Cleaner" is a entry for YogCast GameJam 2019 with the theme, Giving. In this game you need giving garbage to the collector, a big trash monster who need to feed with garbage to not disappear.

In this game you can play [SOLO] or with one friend in the [COOPERATIVE] mode

Single Player: You must collect trash before time runs out to keep the collector alive.

Multiplayer: You need collect more garbage than you friend to win.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/imnotapan

ATTENTION: TO GET SCORE YOU NEED COLLECT GARBAGE AND GIVE IT TO THE COLLECTOR, IF YOU DONT GIVE THE TRASH TO THE COLLECTOR, YOU DONT GET SCORE
